com.justai.zenbox.sdk.api

Class AbstractSkill

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.justai.zenbox.sdk.api.AbstractSkill
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ZenboxListener

    public abstract class AbstractSkill
extends java.lang.Object
implements ZenboxListener
    The AbstractSkill class is a base class for every skill implementation. It implements ZenboxListener interface. ZenboxService invokes a lifecycle callback methods of this class right after the corresponding method was called on the main ZenboxListener. The onResponse(ResponseData) method will be invoked only if isActionSupported(String) method returned true for the action in ResponseData.SuccessResponse.
    See Also:
    ZenboxListener, ResponseData.SuccessResponse

        public void onTriggered()
        Description copied from interface: ZenboxListener
        Called when ZenboxService is going to listen the user's speech. This method will be called on the background thread.

      • onStateChanged

        public void onStateChanged(State state)
        Description copied from interface: ZenboxListener
        Called when ZenboxService has changed it's internal state. This method will be called on the main thread.

      • onRequest

        public void onRequest(RequestData data)
        Description copied from interface: ZenboxListener
        Called when ZenboxService is going to process a recognised user's request. You can fulfill the request with additional data depending on the list of currently enabled skills of your project (like current timestamp, latitude and longitude and etc.). This method will be called on the background thread.
        Specified by:
        onRequest in interface ZenboxListener
        Parameters:
        data - the request data.
        See Also:
        RequestData

      • onResponse

        public final void onResponse(ResponseData response)
        Description copied from interface: ZenboxListener
        Called when ZenboxService has received a response and has already synthesised the speech in the case of success response. This method can be used to dispatch the response data to the appropriate component of your application to process an actions related to the user's intent. This method will be called on the main thread.
        Specified by:
        onResponse in interface ZenboxListener
        Parameters:
        response - a response data.
        See Also:
        ResponseData
